entry.title: To cage a star
entry.summary:
Author: rie_rotisse

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 45,957Chapters: 19/?Kudos: 496

Summary: "Excuse me, um... I need to find someone, would you- would you mind helping me?"The lady who is asked is an old woman at a bus stop, with a warm expression on her face."Yes, dear, who are you looking for?""Um..." The little girl in the pale green dress reaches for her small purse and pulls out a carefully kept piece of paper to give the old lady. "His name is written on the back...""And who may this person be to you, dear?""My dad... Mom said Mr. Bruce Wayne is my dad."

entry.summary:
Author: mothhair

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,693Chapters: 5/8Kudos: 45

entry.title: his favorite blue
entry.summary:
Author: noblecaste

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,166Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 80

Summary: It’s hard, traveling through space and not being able to tell when the void stops and becomes full. Missions out in space are learning experiences, a new perspective on his own world and the others. That’s why he loves when, for whatever reason, they stop.They stop and they can see everything. The bright and dull, the colorful and the monochrome.And Hal loves it.Absolutely adores it.That’s why, when he’s stripped from that sea of colors, his life stops.

entry.title: Slip of the tongue
entry.summary:
Author: BitterHibiscus

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,920Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 73

Summary: Hal wasn't on Earthside when it happened.She had been called to help with cleanup after a particularly nasty mission — a job usually denoted to the Lanterns that had caused the destruction themselves, but since Earth had so many more of them than normal, she found herself volunteering for assists if she knew John or Baz or Jessica would be within or close to sector 2814.Which is why she unfortunately does not get to see the absolute media crashout that happens after Bruce Wayne accidentally reveals he's been happily married for over two years.

entry.title: in the shadow of wings
entry.summary:
Author: forevernightfall

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,345Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 35

Summary: Hal exhaled slowly, closing his eyes for a moment. "Yeah. But I didn’t.""That’s not the point."Something in Bruce’s tone made Hal open his eyes again. The Batplane's interior lighting was dim, casting sharp shadows across Bruce’s face, but Hal could still see the tightness around his mouth, the flicker of something dangerously close to fear in his eyes.Bruce Wayne didn’t get scared.Except, apparently, when it came to him._____________________or, the trials and tribulations of hal jordan and bruce wayne being in a romantic relationshipwritten for BW 365 Day 64 : eject

entry.title: Gravity
entry.summary:
Author: Astrea_Stars

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,759Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 83

Summary: Hal reached the slightly open door to Bruce’s bedroom and pushed it open without thinking.And immediately regretted everything.Because Bruce was—Oh.Oh, shit.Bruce was curled up on his side, half-naked, wrapped around a blanket like it was the only thing keeping him together.He wasn’t fully under the covers—just sprawled across the mattress, one arm tucked under his head, the other gripping the blanket like it was a lifeline. His muscles were still flexed, even in sleep, every line of his body carved and powerful. His broad chest, the sharp curve of his abs, the long stretch of his legs—Hal’s brain short-circuited.Because it should’ve been impossible for a man this big, this built, to look so adorable.(Just want to let you know that reading the smut is completely optional, it doesn't affect the story if you don't want to read it)
